## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
Explain the problem or limitation this feature would address.
Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative approaches? Describe them here.

## Use Case
Describe your specific use case for this feature:
- What are you trying to accomplish?
- How often would you use this feature?
- Would this benefit other users?

## Examples
If possible, provide examples of:
- Other plugins or software with similar features
- Mockups or screenshots of how it might look
- Sample code or workflow

## Priority
How important is this feature to your workflow?
- [ ] Critical - Blocking my work
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Just an idea

What type of feature is this?
- [ ] Export functionality
